backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law - 170 Merton Street

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 1347-2019 to designate 170 Merton Street (Toronto-St. Paul's, Ward 12) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

subheading: In the matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
